content.content:
# About
This is a sample of the website created using JSON file as data source. Vuejs is used to process the data and **[vue-markdown](https://github.com/miaolz123/vue-markdown)** by miaolz123 is used to render the markdown content provided from the JSON file.

The [JSON Content Editor](#) can be used to edit the contents. The editor is also made using VueJs and utilised **[Writing](https://github.com/josephernest/writing/)** a lightweight distraction-free markdown editor by josephernest

This is a test page

- [x] Write the press release
- [ ] Update the website
- [ ] Contact the media
